creator: Sentient Meat
descriptionHtml:
Learn to play any guitar chord. Its easy and simple!

Whether you're learning to play rock music, acoustic guitar or classical. Guitar chords are what you learn first.

Most apps will charge you extra to unlock the minor chords or other tricky chords. We don't do that.

Other apps complicate things with scales, finders or other things you don't need when you're just learning. We don't do that either.

We have right AND left hand modes. Play your song your way.

Chord Lord is a chord diagram app for all guitar chords.
• Over 600 chords
• Entire guitar fretboard is covered.
• Finger position for each note in the chord
• ALL the guitar chords for free, we will never charge you to unlock extra chords.
• Strum the chord to hear how it sounds, or strum individual strings to
hear each note on its own.
• Right or left-handed display options.
• Majors, minors 7ths, augmented, diminished - if we don't have it, let us
know!
• Multiple fingering options for many chords.
• Not a chord finder app, just a chord chart app

You'll be playing for favourite guitar songs in no time!

Note for note! Scale for scale! Chord for chord! Rock on!

title: Chord Lord for Guitar
